job_description:
A company is looking for a Senior Operations Director to join their National Design-Build team, focusing on strategy, operations, and business development within the renewable energy and construction sectors.

Key Responsibilities:
• Oversee project development lifecycle and lead monthly project reviews
• Develop and implement the National Design-Build McKinstry Way process and toolkit
• Ownership of key accounts or pursuits, including business development and ESG reporting/toolkit support

Required Qualifications:
• 10+ years' experience in operational/strategic leadership roles
• Experience in external client-facing roles with technical knowledge in the company's domains of expertise
• Agility and ability to adapt quickly to changing demands/environment
• Expertise in operations or project management
• Strong interpersonal skills and effectiveness in building relationships
